title: Android app deals of the day: Hitman Sniper FREE, Hydro Coach, DRAGON QUEST VIII, more
content:
All of Tuesday’s best deals on Android game and app deals are now up for the taking. Alongside ongoing pre-order discounts for Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 series smartphones, we are now tracking the first notable price drops on OtterBox’s new cases from $30 as well.  But for now, it’s all about the Google Play price drops on games and apps. Highlights include titles like Hitman Sniper, Hydro Coach PRO, DRAGON QUEST VIII, Hexologic, FineReader PDF Pro, and more. Head below for a complete look at today’s best. 

more…
